Reviews.Title: Great liliput
Reviews.Author: evans mauricio bermudez quintana
Reviews.Content: compact camera that works like a big one. Interchangeable lens is a great advantage from others of its size. Easy to work with

ProductInfo.Features:
In the Box - Pentax Q10, SMC Pentax 5-15mm ED AL (IF) Lens, USB Cable, Battery Charger D-BC68P, Strap, Hot Shoe Cover, Lithium-Ion Battery D-LI68, AC Plug Cord, Software CD-ROM, Body Mount Cover Q Features
World's Smallest & Lightest Interchangeable Lens System - Introduce the new Q10 with its stylish design, bold color options and compact size.
12.4MP CMOS Sensor - Enjoy exceptional image quality with the improved 12.4 megapixels 1/2.3 inch backlit CMOS image sensor.
3 Inch LCD Monitor and fast capture - Easily capture or review images and video using the Q10's large 3 inch LCD monitor.
1080p HD Video - Shoot high quality motion video with stunning full 1080p HD clarity at 30 frames per second.
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Q10 12 Megapixel Hybrid Digital Camera with Lens Kit - Red
